name: Draenei Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner Lightforged with our Draenei Name Generator! Forge a name worthy of Argus and the Burning Legion (or, you know, just something cool).
introduction: So, you're rolling a Draenei in your favorite RPG, or maybe you're writing some epic fan fiction? But you're stuck on the most crucial part: the name! Fear not, wanderer! Our Draenei Name Generator is here to bestow upon you a moniker worthy of the Light. We've delved deep into Draenei lore to bring you a diverse array of prefixes and suffixes, ensuring your generated name feels authentic and awesome. Get ready to embrace your Draenei destiny!
howToUse: Marvel at the awesome Draenei name that appears before your very eyes.
If you're not feeling it, smash that 'Generate' button again! We've got names for days.
Copy and paste your perfect name into your game, story, or... pet rock? We don't judge.
Go forth and conquer, noble Draenei!

faqs.question: Are these names *actually* Draenei?
faqs.answer: We've done our best to emulate the naming conventions found in Draenei lore. While not *officially* endorsed by Blizzard, they're pretty darn close!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for other races/factions?
faqs.answer: You *could*, but it might sound a little… off. These names are specifically crafted for Draenei. But hey, it's your character! Go wild!

faqs.question: How many names can I generate?
faqs.answer: As many as your heart desires! We have an endless supply of Draenei name combinations, thanks to the magic of algorithms (and a healthy dose of creativity).

faqs.question: Will these names guarantee me epic loot?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. This generator can only generate names. You will still need to grind for your epic loot.

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes or suffixes for the generator?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We're always looking to improve. Send your suggestions our way, and we'll see if they fit the Draenei aesthetic.

faqs.question: Is this generator free?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our Draenei Name Generator is completely free to use. Enjoy!
